mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, B.term_taxonomy_id, (select name from tjckr.wp_terms where B.term_taxonomy_id = term_id) as catagory, A.post_title as title, A.post_content as content, A.POST_DATE as reg_date FROM tjckr.wp_posts A, tjckr.wp_term_relationships B WHERE post_status = 'publish' AND A.ID = B.object_id and B.term_taxonomy_id in ('27')
